DataElement.preferredName: Electrocardiography Diagnostic Procedure QTc Interval Assessment Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the assessment related to electrocardiography (a procedure which records the electrical current in the heart in the form of a continuous strip graph) and an assessment of the QTc interval (a measure of the time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave in the heart's electrical cycle, at a standardized heart rate of 60/minute).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Electrocardiography Diagnostic Procedure QTc Interval Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relateing to electrocardiography (a procedure which records the electrical current in the heart in the form of a continuous strip graph) and an assessment of the QTc interval (a measure of the time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave in the heart's electrical cycle, at a standardized heart rate of 60/minute).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: A procedure that displays the electrical activity of the heart.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
